description: This table contains event information for the Plan of Care (POC) master file.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the plan of care record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: POC_EVENTS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item contains events related to creation, modification, and filing of a POC.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Created


Refreshed


Saved


Completed


Deleted


Reopened


Signed


Start Date Changed after Completion


Ratified


Not Ratified


Hospice POC Converted


Deleted A Note


System Created (Hospice Admission)


System Created (Batch)


Home Health POC Converted

columns.name: POC_EVENT_INST_DTTM
columns.description: This item contains the POC event instant.

columns.name: POC_EVENT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for user record associated with the plan of care event.

columns.name: POC_EVENT_LINK_CSN
columns.description: The contact serial number of the plan of care contact that is linked to an event in the POC.

columns.name: EVENT_AUD_PREV_VAL
columns.description: As part of audit information for events on the plan of care, this item stores the changed value for items in the POC that changed in the event.

columns.name: EVENT_AUD_CUR_VAL
columns.description: As part of audit information for events on the plan of care, this item stores the original value for items in the POC that changed in the event.

columns.name: EVENT_AUD_HX_ITEM
columns.description: As part of audit information for events on the plan of care, this item stores items in the POC that changed in the event.

columns.name: POC_EVENT_COMMENT
columns.description: Contains the comment linked to an event in the POC events log.
